thread.title: Watch: This flight safety demonstration will leave you in splits
thread.title_full: Watch: This flight safety demonstration will leave you in splits

author: Deccan
title: Watch: This flight safety demonstration will leave you in splits
text:
Deccan Chronicle | October 21, 2015, 15.53 pm A screen grab from the video showing the flight attendant giving a hilariously over-the-top safety demonstration session to the passengers. (Picture Courtesy: Facebook) Remember just how boring those safety demonstration procedures can be before the flight takes off? We bet most of you just yawn through the whole routine without paying any special attention. But the flight attendant featured in this video will make sure that you not only pay close attention but also laugh your heart out during the drill.
The video shows him presenting the safety manual with a flourish in the beginning. After that he goes on to demonstrate how a seatbelt works and goes on to point towards the various emergency exit doors in the most hilarious way.
He mimes and gives a performance similar to a burlesque act throughout the entire session even when he has to teach the passengers how to use their oxygen masks. Not surprisingly, several passengers are heard chuckling in the background. This is definitely one safety demonstration that no one would ever want to miss!
Click on the link below to watch the video:
There's no way you could miss this safety demonstration
Is this the most entertaining flight attendant ever?
